   432â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   433â†’# ENHANCED STATUS DISPLAY
   434â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   435â†’
   436â†’show_status() {
   437â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
   438â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}          Claude Ultimate Wrapper v13.1 Status${NC}"
   439â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
   440â†’    echo
   441â†’    
   442â†’    # System Info
   443â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}System:${NC}"
   444â†’    echo "  OS: $(uname -s 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
   445â†’    echo "  User: $USER"
   446â†’    echo "  Shell: ${SHELL##*/}"
   447â†’    echo
   448â†’    
   449â†’    # Node.js and npm
   450â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Node Environment:${NC}"
   451â†’    if command_exists node; then
   452â†’        echo -e "  Node.js: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} $(node --version)"
   453â†’    else
   454â†’        echo -e "  Node.js: ${RED}${ERROR} Not installed${NC}"
   455â†’    fi
   456â†’    
   457â†’    if command_exists npm; then
   458â†’        echo -e "  npm: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} v$(npm --version)"
   459â†’        echo "  Global prefix: $(npm config get prefix 2>/dev/null)"
   460â†’    else
   461â†’        echo -e "  npm: ${RED}${ERROR} Not installed${NC}"
   462â†’    fi
   463â†’    echo
   464â†’    
   465â†’    # Claude Binary
   466â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Claude Installation:${NC}"
   467â†’    local claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
   468â†’    if [[ -n "$claude_binary" ]]; then
   469â†’        echo -e "  Binary: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} $claude_binary"
   470â†’        
   471â†’        # Health check
   472â†’        verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
   473â†’        local health_status=$?
   474â†’        case $health_status in
   475â†’            0) echo -e "  Health: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS} Operational${NC}" ;;
   476â†’            2) echo -e "  Health: ${YELLOW}${WARNING} yoga.wasm issue detected (auto-fix available)${NC}" ;;
   477â†’            3) echo -e "  Health: ${YELLOW}${WARNING} Missing modules${NC}" ;;
   478â†’            *) echo -e "  Health: ${RED}${ERROR} Issues detected${NC}" ;;
   479â†’        esac
   480â†’    else
   481â†’        echo -e "  Binary: ${RED}${ERROR} Not found${NC}"
   482â†’        echo "  Install: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
   483â†’    fi
   484â†’    echo
   485â†’    
   486â†’    # Virtual Environment
   487â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Python Environment:${NC}"
   488â†’    if [[ "${CLAUDE_VENV_ACTIVATED:-false}" == "true" ]]; then
   489â†’        echo -e "  Venv: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS} Active${NC}"
   490â†’        echo "  Path: ${CLAUDE_VENV_PATH}"
   491â†’        echo "  Python: $(which python3 2>/dev/null || echo 'not found')"
   492â†’    else
   493â†’        echo -e "  Venv: ${DIM}Not active${NC}"
   494â†’        echo "  Python: $(which python3 2>/dev/null || echo 'system default')"
   495â†’    fi
   496â†’    echo
   497â†’    
   498â†’    # Directories
   499â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Directories:${NC}"
   500â†’    echo "  Project: $CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT"
   501â†’    if [[ -d "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" ]]; then
   502â†’        local total_agents=$(find "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" -name "*.md" 2>/dev/null | wc -l)
   503â†’        echo "  Agents: $CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR ($total_agents found)"
   504â†’    else
   505â†’        echo -e "  Agents: ${RED}${ERROR} Not found${NC}"
   506â†’    fi
   507â†’    echo "  Cache: $CACHE_DIR"
   508â†’    
   509â†’    # Agent Registry Status
   510â†’    local registry_file="$CACHE_DIR/registered_agents.json"
   511â†’    if [[ -f "$registry_file" ]]; then
   512â†’        local registered_count=0
   513â†’        local active_count=0
   514â†’        local template_count=0
   515â†’        local stub_count=0
   516â†’        
   517â†’        if command_exists python3; then
   518â†’            eval "$(python3 -c "
   519â†’import json, sys
   520â†’try:
   521â†’    with open('$registry_file', 'r') as f:
   522â†’        registry = json.load(f)
   523â†’    agents = registry.get('agents', {})
   524â†’    print(f'registered_count={len(agents)}')
   525â†’    print(f'active_count={sum(1 for a in agents.values() if a.get(\"status\") == \"active\")}')
   526â†’    print(f'template_count={sum(1 for a in agents.values() if a.get(\"status\") == \"template\")}')
   527â†’    print(f'stub_count={sum(1 for a in agents.values() if a.get(\"status\") == \"stub\")}')
   528â†’except Exception:
   529â†’    print('registered_count=0')
   530â†’" 2>/dev/null)"
   531â†’        fi
   532â†’        
   533â†’        echo "  Registry: $registered_count registered"
   534â†’        [[ $active_count -gt 0 ]] && echo "    Active: $active_count"
   535â†’        [[ $template_count -gt 0 ]] && echo "    Templates: $template_count"
   536â†’        [[ $stub_count -gt 0 ]] && echo "    Stubs: $stub_count"
   537â†’    else
   538â†’        echo -e "  Registry: ${DIM}Not created (run 'claude agents' to register)${NC}"
   539â†’    fi
   540â†’    echo
   541â†’    
   542â†’    # Agent System (check actual status)
   543â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Agent System:${NC}"
   544â†’    if [[ -f "$HOME/Documents/claude-backups/agents/src/python/production_orchestrator.py" ]]; then
   545â†’        echo -e "  Production Orchestrator: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS} Available${NC}"
   546â†’    else
   547â†’        echo -e "  Production Orchestrator: ${YELLOW}${WARNING} Not found${NC}"
   548â†’    fi
   549â†’    
   550â†’    # C Binary Layer is typically not active due to microcode restrictions
   551â†’    echo -e "  C Binary Layer: ${YELLOW}${WARNING} Not active${NC}"
   552â†’    echo -e "  Note: Using Python fallback mode"
   553â†’    echo
   554â†’    
   555â†’    # Features
   556â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Features:${NC}"
   557â†’    [[ "$PERMISSION_BYPASS" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Permission Bypass: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Permission Bypass: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
   558â†’    [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Auto-Fix: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Auto-Fix: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
   559â†’    [[ "$ORCHESTRATION_ENABLED" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Orchestration: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Orchestration: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
   560â†’    [[ "$LEARNING_MODE" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Learning Mode: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Learning Mode: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
   561â†’    [[ "$DEBUG_MODE" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Debug Mode: ${GREEN}Active${NC}" || echo -e "  Debug Mode: ${DIM}Inactive${NC}"
   562â†’    echo -e "  Banner Suppression: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}"
   563â†’    echo
   564â†’    
   565â†’    # Quick Commands
   566â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Quick Commands:${NC}"
   567â†’    echo "  claude --help          Show help"
   568â†’    echo "  claude --fix           Auto-fix issues"
   569â†’    echo "  claude --safe          Run without permission bypass"
   570â†’    echo "  claude task <text>     Execute a task"
   571â†’    echo "  claude agent <name>    Run specific agent"
   572â†’}
   573â†’
   574â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   575â†’# AUTO-FIX FUNCTION
   576â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   577â†’
   578â†’auto_fix_issues() {
   579â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
   580â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}              Claude Auto-Fix System${NC}"
   581â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
   582â†’    echo
   583â†’    
   584â†’    log_info "Checking for issues..."
   585â†’    
   586â†’    # Check Node/npm
   587â†’    if ! check_node_npm; then
   588â†’        log_error "Node.js/npm issues detected. Please install Node.js 14+ and npm."
   589â†’        return 1
   590â†’    fi
   591â†’    
   592â†’    # Find and check Claude binary
   593â†’    local claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
   594â†’    if [[ -z "$claude_binary" ]]; then
   595â†’        log_fixing "Claude not found. Installing..."
   596â†’        npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force
   597â†’        
   598â†’        claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
   599â†’        if [[ -n "$claude_binary" ]]; then
   600â†’            log_success "Claude installed successfully"
   601â†’        else
   602â†’            log_error "Failed to install Claude"
   603â†’            return 1
   604â†’        fi
   605â†’    fi
   606â†’    
   607â†’    # Check health
   608â†’    verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
   609â†’    local health_status=$?
   610â†’    
   611â†’    case $health_status in
   612â†’        0)
   613â†’            log_success "Claude is healthy - no issues found"
   614â†’            ;;
   615â†’        2)
   616â†’            log_fixing "Fixing yoga.wasm issue..."
   617â†’            fix_yoga_wasm_issue
   618â†’            
   619â†’            # Verify fix
   620â†’            verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
   621â†’            if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
   622â†’                log_success "yoga.wasm issue fixed"
   623â†’            else
   624â†’                log_warning "yoga.wasm workaround applied"
   625â†’            fi
   626â†’            ;;
   627â†’        *)
   628â†’            log_fixing "Attempting general fixes..."
   629â†’            npm cache clean --force >/dev/null 2>&1
   630â†’            npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force >/dev/null 2>&1
   631â†’            
   632â†’            verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
   633â†’            if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
   634â†’                log_success "Issues resolved"
   635â†’            else
   636â†’                log_warning "Some issues remain - using workaround mode"
   637â†’            fi
   638â†’            ;;
   639â†’    esac
   640â†’    
   641â†’    echo
   642â†’    log_info "Auto-fix complete. Run 'claude --status' to verify."
   643â†’}
   644â†’
   645â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   646â†’# AGENT MANAGEMENT WITH AUTOMATIC REGISTRATION
   647â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   648â†’
   649â†’# Agent registry cache
   650â†’AGENT_REGISTRY_CACHE="$CACHE_DIR/agent_registry.cache"
   651â†’AGENT_REGISTRY_TIMESTAMP="$CACHE_DIR/agent_registry.timestamp"
   652â†’
   653â†’# Automatic agent registration from agents/ directory
   654â†’register_agents_from_directory() {
   655â†’    local agents_dir="${1:-$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR}"
   656â†’    local registry_file="$CACHE_DIR/registered_agents.json"
   657â†’    
   658â†’    if [[ ! -d "$agents_dir" ]]; then
   659â†’        log_warning "Agents directory not found: $agents_dir"
   660â†’        return 1
   661â†’    fi
   662â†’    
   663â†’    log_debug "Registering agents from: $agents_dir"
   664â†’    
   665â†’    # Create registry file if it doesn't exist
   666â†’    if [[ ! -f "$registry_file" ]]; then
   667â†’        echo '{"agents": {}, "last_updated": "", "total_count": 0}' > "$registry_file"
   668â†’    fi
   669â†’    
   670â†’    local agent_count=0
   671â†’    local updated_agents=()
   672â†’    
   673â†’    # Initialize registry JSON
   674â†’    local temp_registry=$(mktemp)
   675â†’    echo '{"agents": {}, "last_updated": "'$(date -Iseconds)'", "total_count": 0}' > "$temp_registry"
   676â†’    
   677â†’    while IFS= read -r agent_file; do
   678â†’        if [[ ! -f "$agent_file" ]]; then
   679â†’            continue
   680â†’        fi
   681â†’        
   682â†’        local agent_name=$(basename "$agent_file" | sed 's/\.[mM][dD]$//' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')
   683â†’        local agent_display_name=$(basename "$agent_file" | sed 's/\.[mM][dD]$//')
   684â†’        local category="general"
   685â†’        local description=""
   686â†’        local uuid=""
   687â†’        local tools=()
   688â†’        local status="active"
   689â†’        
   690â†’        # Extract metadata from agent file
   691â†’        if [[ -r "$agent_file" ]]; then
   692â†’            # Try to extract category from frontmatter or content
   693â†’            if grep -q "^category:" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   694â†’                category=$(grep "^category:" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/category: *//; s/[[:space:]]*$//')
   695â†’            elif grep -qE "^\*\*Category:\*\*" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   696â†’                category=$(grep -E "^\*\*Category:\*\*" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/^\*\*Category:\*\* *//; s/[[:space:]]*$//')
   697â†’            fi
   698â†’            
   699â†’            # Extract description
   700â†’            if grep -q "^description:" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   701â†’                description=$(grep "^description:" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/description: *//; s/[[:space:]]*$//')
   702â†’            elif grep -qE "^\*\*Purpose:\*\*" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   703â†’                description=$(grep -E "^\*\*Purpose:\*\*" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/^\*\*Purpose:\*\* *//; s/[[:space:]]*$//')
   704â†’            elif grep -q "^## Purpose" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   705â†’                description=$(awk '/^## Purpose/{getline; print; exit}' "$agent_file" | sed 's/^[[:space:]]*//; s/[[:space:]]*$//')
   706â†’            fi
   707â†’            
   708â†’            # Extract UUID
   709â†’            if grep -q "^uuid:" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   710â†’                uuid=$(grep "^uuid:" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/uuid: *//; s/[[:space:]]*$//')
   711â†’            elif grep -qE "^\*\*UUID:\*\*" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   712â†’                uuid=$(grep -E "^\*\*UUID:\*\*" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/^\*\*UUID:\*\* *//; s/[[:space:]]*$//')
   713â†’            fi
   714â†’            
   715â†’            # Extract tools array (simplified - look for tools: section)
   716â†’            if grep -q "^tools:" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   717â†’                # Extract tools array items (basic implementation)
   718â†’                while IFS= read -r tool_line; do
   719â†’                    if [[ "$tool_line" =~ ^[[:space:]]*-[[:space:]]*(.+)$ ]]; then
   720â†’                        tools+=("${BASH_REMATCH[1]}")
   721â†’                    fi
   722â†’                done < <(awk '/^tools:/,/^[^[:space:]-]/ {if ($0 ~ /^[[:space:]]*-/) print $0}' "$agent_file" | head -10)
   723â†’            fi
   724â†’            
   725â†’            # Determine status based on file completeness
   726â†’            local file_size=$(stat -f%z "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null || stat -c%s "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
   727â†’            if [[ $file_size -lt 100 ]]; then
   728â†’                status="stub"
   729â†’            elif ! grep -q "## Implementation" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   730â†’                status="template"
   731â†’            else
   732â†’                status="active"
   733â†’            fi
   734â†’        fi
   735â†’        
   736â†’        # Build JSON entry for this agent
   737â†’        local tools_json=""
   738â†’        if [[ ${#tools[@]} -gt 0 ]]; then
   739â†’            tools_json=$(printf '"%s",' "${tools[@]}")
   740â†’            tools_json="[${tools_json%,}]"
   741â†’        else
   742â†’            tools_json="[]"
   743â†’        fi
   744â†’        
   745â†’        # Add agent to temporary registry
   746â†’        local agent_json='{
   747â†’            "name": "'$agent_name'",
   748â†’            "display_name": "'$agent_display_name'",
   749â†’            "file_path": "'$agent_file'",
   750â†’            "category": "'${category:-general}'",
   751â†’            "description": "'${description:-No description available}'",
   752â†’            "uuid": "'${uuid:-unknown}'",
   753â†’            "tools": '$tools_json',
   754â†’            "status": "'$status'",
   755â†’            "last_modified": "'$(date -r "$agent_file" -Iseconds 2>/dev/null || date -Iseconds)'"
   756â†’        }'
   757â†’        
   758â†’        # Use python or node to properly merge JSON (fallback to simple method)
   759â†’        if command_exists python3; then
   760â†’            python3 -c "
   761â†’import json, sys
   762â†’try:
   763â†’    with open('$temp_registry', 'r') as f: registry = json.load(f)
   764â†’    registry['agents']['$agent_name'] = $agent_json
   765â†’    registry['total_count'] = len(registry['agents'])
   766â†’    with open('$temp_registry', 'w') as f: json.dump(registry, f, indent=2)
   767â†’except Exception as e:
   768â†’    print(f'JSON merge error: {e}', file=sys.stderr)
   769â†’            " 2>/dev/null || log_debug "Python JSON merge failed for agent: $agent_name"
   770â†’        fi
   771â†’        
   772â†’        updated_agents+=("$agent_name")
   773â†’        ((agent_count++))
   774â†’        
   775â†’        log_debug "Registered agent: $agent_name [$category] - $status"
   776â†’        
   777â†’    done < <(find "$agents_dir" -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.MD" \) 2>/dev/null | grep -v -i template | head -100)
   778â†’    
   779â†’    # Move temporary registry to final location
   780â†’    if [[ -s "$temp_registry" ]]; then
   781â†’        mv "$temp_registry" "$registry_file"
   782â†’        echo "$agent_count" > "$CACHE_DIR/agent_count.cache"
   783â†’        echo "${updated_agents[*]}" > "$CACHE_DIR/agent_names.cache"
   784â†’        log_debug "Agent registration complete: $agent_count agents registered"
   785â†’        return 0
   786â†’    else
   787â†’        rm -f "$temp_registry" 2>/dev/null
   788â†’        log_warning "Agent registration failed - no agents found or processed"
   789â†’        return 1
   790â†’    fi
   791â†’}
   792â†’
   793â†’# Get registered agent information
   794â†’get_agent_info() {
   795â†’    local agent_name="$1"
   796â†’    local registry_file="$CACHE_DIR/registered_agents.json"
   797â†’    
   798â†’    if [[ ! -f "$registry_file" ]]; then
   799â†’        return 1
   800â†’    fi
   801â†’    
   802â†’    if command_exists python3; then
   803â†’        python3 -c "
   804â†’import json, sys
   805â†’try:
   806â†’    with open('$registry_file', 'r') as f:
   807â†’        registry = json.load(f)
   808â†’    agent = registry['agents'].get('${agent_name,,}')
   809â†’    if agent:
   810â†’        print(f\"Name: {agent['display_name']}\")
   811â†’        print(f\"Category: {agent['category']}\")
   812â†’        print(f\"Status: {agent['status']}\")
   813â†’        print(f\"Description: {agent['description']}\")
   814â†’        print(f\"File: {agent['file_path']}\")
   815â†’        if agent['tools']:
   816â†’            print(f\"Tools: {', '.join(agent['tools'])}\")
   817â†’    else:
   818â†’        sys.exit(1)
   819â†’except Exception:
   820â†’    sys.exit(1)
   821â†’        " 2>/dev/null
   822â†’    else
   823â†’        # Fallback: try to find agent file directly
   824â†’        find_agent_file "$agent_name" >/dev/null 2>&1
   825â†’    fi
   826â†’}
   827â†’
   828â†’# Find agent file (enhanced version)
   829â†’find_agent_file() {
   830â†’    local agent_name="$1"
   831â†’    local agents_dir="${CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR}"
   832â†’    
   833â†’    # Try multiple name variations and locations
   834â†’    local search_patterns=(
   835â†’        "${agents_dir}/${agent_name}.md"
   836â†’        "${agents_dir}/${agent_name}.MD"
   837â†’        "${agents_dir}/${agent_name^^}.md"
   838â†’        "${agents_dir}/${agent_name,,}.md"
   839â†’        "${agents_dir}/*${agent_name,,}*.md"
   840â†’        "${agents_dir}/*${agent_name^^}*.md"
   841â†’    )
   842â†’    
   843â†’    for pattern in "${search_patterns[@]}"; do
   844â†’        local matches=($(ls $pattern 2>/dev/null | head -5))
   845â†’        if [[ ${#matches[@]} -gt 0 ]]; then
   846â†’            echo "${matches[0]}"
   847â†’            return 0
   848â†’        fi
   849â†’    done
   850â†’    
   851â†’    return 1
   852â†’}
   853â†’
   854â†’list_agents() {
   855â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}Available Agents:${NC}"
   856â†’    echo
   857â†’    
   858â†’    # Auto-register agents if not already done or if directory is newer
   859â†’    local registry_file="$CACHE_DIR/registered_agents.json"
   860â†’    local should_register=false
   861â†’    
   862â†’    if [[ ! -f "$registry_file" ]]; then
   863â†’        should_register=true
   864â†’    elif [[ -d "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" ]]; then
   865â†’        # Check if agents directory is newer than registry
   866â†’        local agents_newer=$(find "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" -name "*.md" -newer "$registry_file" 2>/dev/null | wc -l)
   867â†’        [[ $agents_newer -gt 0 ]] && should_register=true
   868â†’    fi
   869â†’    
   870â†’    if $should_register; then
   871â†’        log_debug "Auto-registering agents from directory..."
   872â†’        register_agents_from_directory "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR"
   873â†’    fi
   874â†’    
   875â†’    # Display registered agents
   876â†’    if [[ -f "$registry_file" ]] && command_exists python3; then
   877â†’        python3 -c "
   878â†’import json, sys
   879â†’try:
   880â†’    with open('$registry_file', 'r') as f:
   881â†’        registry = json.load(f)
   882â†’    
   883â†’    agents = registry.get('agents', {})
   884â†’    if not agents:
   885â†’        print('  No agents registered')
   886â†’        sys.exit(0)
   887â†’    
   888â†’    # Group by category
   889â†’    categories = {}
   890â†’    for name, agent in agents.items():
   891â†’        cat = agent.get('category', 'general')
   892â†’        if cat not in categories:
   893â†’            categories[cat] = []
   894â†’        categories[cat].append(agent)
   895â†’    
   896â†’    # Display by category
   897â†’    for category in sorted(categories.keys()):
   898â†’        print(f'\\n  \\033[1;33m{category.title()}:\\033[0m')
   899â†’        agents_in_cat = sorted(categories[category], key=lambda x: x['display_name'])
   900â†’        for agent in agents_in_cat:
   901â†’            status_color = '\\033[0;32m' if agent['status'] == 'active' else '\\033[0;33m' if agent['status'] == 'template' else '\\033[0;31m'
   902â†’            status_symbol = 'âœ“' if agent['status'] == 'active' else 'â—‹' if agent['status'] == 'template' else 'âœ—'
   903â†’            print(f'    {status_color}{status_symbol}\\033[0m \\033[1m{agent[\"display_name\"]:<18}\\033[0m \\033[2m{agent[\"description\"][:50]}\\033[0m')
   904â†’    
   905â†’    print(f'\\n  Total: {len(agents)} agents')
   906â†’    print(f'  Active: {sum(1 for a in agents.values() if a[\"status\"] == \"active\")}')
   907â†’    print(f'  Templates: {sum(1 for a in agents.values() if a[\"status\"] == \"template\")}')
   908â†’    print(f'  Stubs: {sum(1 for a in agents.values() if a[\"status\"] == \"stub\")}')
   909â†’    
   910â†’except Exception as e:
   911â†’    print(f'Error reading agent registry: {e}', file=sys.stderr)
   912â†’    sys.exit(1)
   913â†’        "
   914â†’    else
   915â†’        # Fallback: simple directory listing
   916â†’        if [[ ! -d "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" ]]; then
   917â†’            log_warning "Agents directory not found: $CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR"
   918â†’            return 1
   919â†’        fi
   920â†’        
   921â†’        local count=0
   922â†’        while IFS= read -r agent_file; do
   923â†’            local agent_name=$(basename "$agent_file" | sed 's/\.[mM][dD]$//')
   924â†’            local category="general"
   925â†’            
   926â†’            # Try to extract category from frontmatter
   927â†’            if grep -q "^category:" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   928â†’                category=$(grep "^category:" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/category: *//')
   929â†’            fi
   930â†’            
   931â†’            printf "  %-20s ${DIM}[%s]${NC}\n" "$agent_name" "$category"
   932â†’            ((count++))
   933â†’        done < <(find "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.MD" \) 2>/dev/null | sort)
   934â†’        
   935â†’        echo
   936â†’        echo "Total: $count agents"
   937â†’    fi
   938â†’}
   939â†’
   940â†’run_agent() {
   941â†’    local agent_name="$1"
   942â†’    shift
   943â†’    
   944â†’    if [[ -z "$agent_name" ]]; then
   945â†’        log_error "Usage: claude agent <name> [args]"
   946â†’        return 1
   947â†’    fi
   948â†’    
   949â†’    # Ensure agents are registered
   950â†’    local registry_file="$CACHE_DIR/registered_agents.json"
   951â†’    if [[ ! -f "$registry_file" ]]; then
   952â†’        log_debug "Registering agents for first run..."
   953â†’        register_agents_from_directory "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR"
   954â†’    fi
   955â†’    
   956â†’    # Try to get agent info from registry first
   957â†’    local agent_file=""
   958â†’    if get_agent_info "$agent_name" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
   959â†’        # Get file path from registry
   960â†’        if command_exists python3; then
   961â†’            agent_file=$(python3 -c "
   962â†’import json, sys
   963â†’try:
   964â†’    with open('$registry_file', 'r') as f:
   965â†’        registry = json.load(f)
   966â†’    agent = registry['agents'].get('${agent_name,,}')
   967â†’    if agent:
   968â†’        print(agent['file_path'])
   969â†’    else:
   970â†’        sys.exit(1)
   971â†’except Exception:
   972â†’    sys.exit(1)
   973â†’            " 2>/dev/null)
   974â†’        fi
   975â†’    fi
   976â†’    
   977â†’    # Fallback to manual search
   978â†’    if [[ -z "$agent_file" ]]; then
   979â†’        agent_file=$(find_agent_file "$agent_name")
   980â†’    fi
   981â†’    
   982â†’    if [[ -z "$agent_file" ]] || [[ ! -f "$agent_file" ]]; then
   983â†’        log_error "Agent not found: $agent_name"
   984â†’        echo
   985â†’        echo -e "${CYAN}Available agents:${NC}"
   986â†’        if [[ -f "$registry_file" ]] && command_exists python3; then
   987â†’            python3 -c "
   988â†’import json
   989â†’try:
   990â†’    with open('$registry_file', 'r') as f:
   991â†’        registry = json.load(f)
   992â†’    agents = list(registry.get('agents', {}).keys())[:10]  # Show first 10
   993â†’    for agent in sorted(agents):
   994â†’        print(f'  - {agent}')
   995â†’    if len(registry.get('agents', {})) > 10:
   996â†’        print(f'  ... and {len(registry.get(\"agents\", {})) - 10} more')
   997â†’except Exception:
   998â†’    pass
   999â†’            " 2>/dev/null
  1000â†’        fi
  1001â†’        echo -e "\nRun 'claude agents' to see all available agents"
  1002â†’        return 1
  1003â†’    fi
  1004â†’    
  1005â†’    # Display agent info if available
  1006â†’    log_info "Loading agent: $agent_name"
  1007â†’    if get_agent_info "$agent_name" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  1008â†’        get_agent_info "$agent_name" | while read -r line; do
  1009â†’            log_debug "$line"
  1010â†’        done
  1011â†’    fi
  1012â†’    
  1013â†’    export CLAUDE_AGENT="$agent_name"
  1014â†’    export CLAUDE_AGENT_FILE="$agent_file"
  1015â†’    
  1016â†’    execute_claude "$CLAUDE_BINARY" "$@"
  1017â†’}
  1018â†’
  1019â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
  1020â†’# MAIN EXECUTION
  1021â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
  1022â†’
  1023â†’main() {
  1024â†’    # Initialize environment
  1025â†’    initialize_environment
  1026â†’    
  1027â†’    # Handle special commands
  1028â†’    case "${1:-}" in
  1029â†’        --status|status)
  1030â†’            show_status
  1031â†’            exit 0
  1032â†’            ;;
  1033â†’            
  1034â†’        --fix|fix)
  1035â†’            auto_fix_issues
  1036â†’            exit $?
  1037â†’            ;;
  1038â†’            
  1039â†’        --agents|agents|--list-agents)
  1040â†’            list_agents
  1041â†’            exit 0
  1042â†’            ;;
  1043â†’            
  1044â†’        --register-agents|register-agents)
  1045â†’            echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}Registering agents from directory...${NC}"
  1046â†’            if register_agents_from_directory "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR"; then
  1047â†’                log_success "Agents registered successfully"
  1048â†’                echo
  1049â†’                list_agents
  1050â†’            else
  1051â†’                log_error "Failed to register agents"
  1052â†’                exit 1
  1053â†’            fi
  1054â†’            exit 0
  1055â†’            ;;
  1056â†’            
  1057â†’        --agent|agent)
  1058â†’            shift
  1059â†’            run_agent "$@"
  1060â†’            exit $?
  1061â†’            ;;
  1062â†’            
  1063â†’        --agent-info)
  1064â†’            shift
  1065â†’            local agent_name="$1"
  1066â†’            if [[ -z "$agent_name" ]]; then
  1067â†’                log_error "Usage: claude --agent-info <name>"
  1068â†’                exit 1
  1069â†’            fi
  1070â†’            
  1071â†’            echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}Agent Information: $agent_name${NC}"
  1072â†’            echo
  1073â†’            if get_agent_info "$agent_name"; then
  1074â†’                exit 0
  1075â†’            else
  1076â†’                log_error "Agent not found: $agent_name"
  1077â†’                echo -e "\nRun 'claude agents' to see available agents"
  1078â†’                exit 1
  1079â†’            fi
  1080â†’            ;;
  1081â†’            
  1082â†’        --help|help|-h)
  1083â†’            echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}Claude Ultimate Wrapper v13.1${NC}"
  1084â†’            echo -e "${DIM}Enhanced with automatic agent registration and management${NC}"
  1085â†’            echo
  1086â†’            echo "Usage: claude [OPTIONS] [COMMAND]"
  1087â†’            echo
  1088â†’            echo "Options:"
  1089â†’            echo "  --status           Show comprehensive system status"
  1090â†’            echo "  --fix              Auto-detect and fix issues"
  1091â†’            echo "  --agents           List available agents with categories"
  1092â†’            echo "  --register-agents  Manually register agents from agents/ directory"
  1093â†’            echo "  --agent NAME       Run specific agent"
  1094â†’            echo "  --agent-info NAME  Show detailed information about an agent"
  1095â†’            echo "  --safe             Run without permission bypass"
  1096â†’            echo "  --debug            Enable debug output"
  1097â†’            echo "  --help             Show this help"
  1098â†’            echo
  1099â†’            echo "Commands:"
  1100â†’            echo "  task <text>        Execute a task"
  1101â†’            echo "  agent <name>       Shortcut for --agent"
  1102â†’            echo "  <any>              Pass through to Claude"
  1103â†’            echo
  1104â†’            echo "Agent Management:"
  1105â†’            echo "  â€¢ Agents are automatically discovered from agents/ directory"
  1106â†’            echo "  â€¢ Registry is cached and updated when directory changes"
  1107â†’            echo "  â€¢ Supports metadata extraction (category, description, tools)"
  1108â†’            echo "  â€¢ Status tracking (active/template/stub)"
  1109â†’            echo
  1110â†’            echo "Environment Variables:"
  1111â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX=true         Enable automatic issue fixing"
  1112â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_PERMISSION_BYPASS=true Enable permission bypass"
  1113â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_DEBUG=true            Enable debug mode"
  1114â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT          Set project root directory"
  1115â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR            Path to agents directory"
  1116â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_VENV                  Path to Python virtual environment"
  1117â†’            echo
  1118â†’            echo "Examples:"
  1119â†’            echo "  claude agents                List all available agents"
  1120â†’            echo "  claude agent director        Run the director agent"
  1121â†’            echo "  claude --agent-info security Show security agent details"
  1122â†’            echo "  claude --register-agents     Refresh agent registry"
  1123â†’            echo
  1124â†’            echo "Troubleshooting:"
  1125â†’            echo "  If Claude fails to start, run: claude --fix"
  1126â†’            echo "  For detailed diagnostics: claude --status"
  1127â†’            echo "  For debug output: claude --debug [command]"
  1128â†’            echo "  If agents not found: claude --register-agents"
  1129â†’            exit 0
  1130â†’            ;;
  1131â†’            
  1132â†’        --debug)
  1133â†’            # Already handled at top, just shift and continue
  1134â†’            shift
  1135â†’            ;;
  1136â†’    esac
  1137â†’    
  1138â†’    # Find Claude binary
  1139â†’    CLAUDE_BINARY=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
  1140â†’    
  1141â†’    if [[ -z "$CLAUDE_BINARY" ]]; then
  1142â†’        log_error "Claude not found. Installing..."
  1143â†’        
  1144â†’        if [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]]; then
  1145â†’            npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force
  1146â†’            CLAUDE_BINARY=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
  1147â†’            
  1148â†’            if [[ -z "$CLAUDE_BINARY" ]]; then
  1149â†’                log_error "Failed to install Claude Code"
  1150â†’                echo "Try manual installation: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
  1151â†’                exit 1
  1152â†’            fi
  1153â†’        else
  1154â†’            echo "Install with: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
  1155â†’            echo "Or enable auto-fix: export CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX=true"
  1156â†’            exit 1
  1157â†’        fi
  1158â†’    fi
  1159â†’    
  1160â†’    # Health check
  1161â†’    verify_claude_health "$CLAUDE_BINARY"
  1162â†’    local health_status=$?
  1163â†’    
  1164â†’    if [[ $health_status -ne 0 ]] && [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]]; then
  1165â†’        log_info "Applying automatic fixes..."
  1166â†’        
  1167â†’        case $health_status in
  1168â†’            2) fix_yoga_wasm_issue ;;
  1169â†’            *) 
  1170â†’                # Try general fix
  1171â†’                export NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings"
  1172â†’                export CLAUDE_NO_YOGA=1
  1173â†’                ;;
  1174â†’        esac
  1175â†’    fi
  1176â†’    
  1177â†’    # Execute Claude
  1178â†’    execute_claude "$CLAUDE_BINARY" "$@"
  1179â†’}
  1180â†’
  1181â†’# Error trap with helpful messages
  1182â†’trap 'ec=$?; [[ $ec -ne 0 ]] && log_error "Error at line $LINENO (exit code: $ec). Run with --debug for details." >&2' ERR
  1183â†’
  1184â†’# Run main
  1185â†’main "$@"

<system-reminder>

</system-reminder>
